metadata.title: CVE-2021-44140 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Remote attackers may delete arbitrary files in a system hosting a JSPWikiinstance, versions up to 2.11.0.M8, by using a carefuly crafted httprequest on logout, given that those files are reachable to the user runningthe JSPWiki instance. Apache JSPWiki users should upgrade to 2.11.0 orlater.

criterions.comment: jspwiki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
